title: Bug: Season Switch and Conferences in fake phases
body_html:
When switching to the fake application phase or the fake proposal phase in /orga/seasons
and clicking on Community,
I get a 500 with this message:

[Rollbar] Reporting exception: PG::UndefinedTable: ERROR:  missing FROM-clause entry for table "conferences"
LINE 1: ... WHERE (teams.name ILIKE '%%') GROUP BY users.id, conference...
                                                             ^

It happens only in dev mode.

It happens only in dev mode.
body:
When switching to the fake application phase or the fake proposal phase in /orga/seasons
and clicking on Community, 
I get a 500 with this message:
```
[Rollbar] Reporting exception: PG::UndefinedTable: ERROR:  missing FROM-clause entry for table "conferences"
LINE 1: ... WHERE (teams.name ILIKE '%%') GROUP BY users.id, conference...
                                                             ^
```

It happens only in dev mode.
